user.title: Routinely
user.description: Set up Routinely timer-guided routine execution.

data_description.enable_notifications: Send notifications with TTS announcements to mobile devices
data_description.notification_targets: Comma-separated notify service names (e.g., mobile_app_iphone, mobile_app_pixel)
data_description.task_ending_warning: Seconds before task ends to fire warning event (0 to disable)
data_description.default_advancement_mode: Default mode for new tasks (auto, manual, confirm)

data_description.tts_entity: Entity ID of media player for TTS (e.g., media_player.living_room)

create_task.name: Create Task
create_task.description: Create a new task for use in routines.

advancement_mode.name: Advancement Mode
advancement_mode.description: How the task advances when timer expires

confirm_window.name: Confirm Window
confirm_window.description: Seconds allowed for confirmation (confirm mode only)

routine_id.name: Routine ID
routine_id.description: ID of the routine to start

complete_task.name: Complete Task
complete_task.description: Manually complete the current task (for manual/confirm mode).
